entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
